definition: To reinforce or fortify something, typically used in the context of enhancing or strengthening a particular aspect, quality, or attribute.

examples.english: I want to use my strengths.

examples.german: Die Übung soll die Muskeln stärken.
examples.english: The exercise is meant to strengthen the muscles.

examples.german: Er versucht, seine Position zu stärken.
examples.english: He is trying to strengthen his position.

examples.german: Die Therapie soll das Immunsystem stärken.
examples.english: The therapy is meant to strengthen the immune system.
